flavor_text: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is saidthat it will share good luck when treated kindly.
A proverb claims that happiness will come to any one who can make a sleeping TOGEPI stand up.
It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Itsshell is said to be filled with happiness.
As its energy TOGEPI uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokemon.This Pokemon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell then shares them with others.
